mapper.select: SELECT a.product_id productId, a.category_id categoryId, a.feature_id featureId, a.country_id countryId, c.aroma_category_id aromaId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.quantity, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, a.alcohol, b.sale, b.sale_price salePrice, b.sale_yn saleYn FROM t_product a LEFT JOIN t_sale b ON a.product_id = b.product_id LEFT JOIN t_aroma c ON a.product_id = c.product_id WHERE price < 20000 GROUP BY a.product_id LIMIT 6

SELECT a.product_id productId, a.category_id categoryId, a.feature_id featureId, a.country_id countryId, c.aroma_category_id aromaId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.quantity, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, a.alcohol, b.sale, b.sale_price salePrice, b.sale_yn saleYn FROM t_product a LEFT JOIN t_sale b ON a.product_id = b.product_id LEFT JOIN t_aroma c ON a.product_id = c.product_id WHERE price > 20000 AND price < 50000 GROUP BY a.product_id LIMIT 6

SELECT a.product_id productId, a.category_id categoryId, a.feature_id featureId, a.country_id countryId, c.aroma_category_id aromaId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.quantity, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, a.alcohol, b.sale, b.sale_price salePrice, b.sale_yn saleYn FROM t_product a LEFT JOIN t_sale b ON a.product_id = b.product_id LEFT JOIN t_aroma c ON a.product_id = c.product_id WHERE price > 50000 AND price < 100000 GROUP BY a.product_id LIMIT 6

SELECT a.product_id productId, a.category_id categoryId, a.feature_id featureId, a.country_id countryId, c.aroma_category_id aromaId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.quantity, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, a.alcohol, b.sale, b.sale_price salePrice, b.sale_yn saleYn FROM t_product a LEFT JOIN t_sale b ON a.product_id = b.product_id LEFT JOIN t_aroma c ON a.product_id = c.product_id WHERE price > 100000 GROUP BY a.product_id LIMIT 6

SELECT a.product_id productId, a.category_id categoryId, a.feature_id featureId, a.country_id countryId, d.aroma_category_id aromaId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.quantity, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, a.alcohol, c.sale, c.sale_price, c.sale_yn saleYn FROM t_product a LEFT JOIN t_country b ON a.country_id = b.country_id LEFT JOIN t_sale c ON a.product_id = c.product_id LEFT JOIN t_aroma d ON a.product_id = d.product_id WHERE b.country_id = #{countryId} GROUP BY a.product_id LIMIT 6

SELECT DISTINCT a.product_id productId, a.category_id categoryId, a.feature_id featureId, a.country_id countryId, f.aroma_category_id aromaId, d.big_category_id bigCategoryId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.quantity, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, a.alcohol, e.sale, e.sale_price salePrice, e.sale_yn saleYn FROM t_product a LEFT JOIN t_wine_pairing b ON a.product_id = b.product_id LEFT JOIN t_small_category c ON b.small_category_id = c.small_category_id LEFT JOIN t_big_category d ON c.big_category_id = d.big_category_id LEFT JOIN t_sale e ON a.product_id = e.product_id LEFT JOIN t_aroma f ON a.product_id = f.product_id WHERE d.big_category_id = #{bigCategoryId} GROUP BY a.product_id LIMIT 6

SELECT a.product_id productId, a.category_id categoryId, a.feature_id featureId, a.country_id countryId, d.aroma_category_id aromaId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.quantity, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, a.alcohol, c.sale, c.sale_price salePrice, c.sale_yn saleYn from t_product a INNER JOIN t_user_info b ON a.product_id = b.product_id INNER JOIN t_sale c ON a.product_id = c.product_id INNER JOIN t_aroma d ON a.product_id = d.product_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.product_id
SELECT c.product_id productId FROM t_user a INNER JOIN t_order b ON a.user_id = b.user_id INNER JOIN t_order_detail c ON b.order_id = c.order_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}
